unnormalised: Delhiites experienced a sweltering day yesterday, with temps soaring to 43°C at 3 PM IST. The IMD reported that the heat wave conditions are likely to persist for the next 48 hrs. Many areas recorded their highest temps for the month of June on 06/06/2024, breaking previous records set in 2019.
normalised: Delhiites experienced a sweltering day yesterday, with temperatures soaring to forty three degree celsius at three P-M I-S-T. The I-M-D reported that the heat wave conditions are likely to persist for the next forty eight hours. Many areas recorded their highest temperatures for the month of June on sixth June two thousand and twenty four, breaking previous records set in two thousand and nineteen.

unnormalised: According to the forecast, a slight respite is expected on 08/06/2024, with the possibility of dust storms and light rain towards the evening.
